nodes.text: Fusai was a terrestrial world in the galaxy. During the Galactic Civil War, the Alliance to Restore the Republic had a records office there, which, according to an R5 unit, was looking for more protocol droid staff members. After the assault on Sunspot Prison, C-3PO insisted that he would request a transfer there.
Fusai first appeared in Gambler's World, a Star Wars Legends comic strip published in 1979. In 2016, Fusai became canonized by Star Wars 19, a comic book written by Jason Aaron.
